General.Name: United Electronics Company
General.Description: United Electronics Company, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the wholesale and retail operations in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and internationally. The company operates in Sales and Services; and Consumer Finance segments. It is involved in the wholesale and retail trade of electric appliances, electronic gadgets, computers and spare parts and accessories, furniture, medical supplies, and office equipment and tools, as well as offers maintenance, repair, and warranty services. The company also offers computers, smartphones, gift cards, and installment sales; and provides consumer finance business under the Tasheel brand name. United Electronics Company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Al Khobar, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: King Faisal Road, Al Khobar, Saudi Arabia, 31952
